## Import data

```{r}
fuel <- read.csv("../../../../data/qld_fuel.csv")
```

### Install packages

```{r}
library(dplyr)

library(ggplot2)
```

## Fuel Sites

See @weschke_nighttime_2024 for more details

```{r}
fuel %>%  ggplot(aes(x = Site_Latitude, y = Site_Longitude)) + geom_jitter(aes(colour = Fuel_Type))
```
